column3: Our eyes are closed and we’re about to cross the street
What did you want to show us
Because all I can see is this bitchin' van
Yeah, it’s for our catering business
I think I know that girl
All right, umm, we’re not gonna really keep it this way though
No, we’re gonna paint over the sword, and replace it with a baguette
And also, we don’t know what to do with this
Oh yeah, I definitely know her
Remember that guy from cooking school I told you about that put cilantro with everything
Well, I’m gonna fill in for him as food critic for the Chelsea Reporter
What an amazing opportunity to influence… dozens of people
How could you say yes, what about our catering business
Oh no-no-no, it’s only one night a week, and plus I get to take all of you out for a lot of free dinners
That was me hopping on board
Hey, Ross, quick question for ya
I don’t know, I could maybe go out for a couple of beers, but there’s this thing about bumblebees on The Discovery Channel that I was planning to watch
No-no, I don’t think you heard me
Kathy’s with her parents, I have nothing to do, so tomorrow we are partying with Gandolf dude
Dude, we are sooo gonna party
Mike "Gandolf" Ganderson, only like the funest guy in the world
I’m gonna call and get off work tomorrow
This is gonna be soo cool, dude, we never party anymore
All right, were you guys smoking something in the back of our van
And what do you mean you never have fun anymore
You have fun with me, remember that time we saw those strippers and you paid me 50 bucks to eat that book
Joey, you are gonna love this guy
Gandolf is like the party wizard
Well, why do you call him Gandolf
Didn’t you read Lord of the Rings in high school
No, I had sex in high school
Oh, uh, Joanna I was wondering if I could ask you something
There’s an opening for an assistant buyer in Junior Miss…
Okay, but that would actually be a big step down for me
Well, actually, I meant for me
The hiring committee is meeting people all day and…
Well, I wish I could say no, but you can’t stay my assistant forever
Neither can you Sophie, but for different reasons
God, I am so glad you don’t have a problem with this, because if you did, I wouldn’t even consider applying
And that’s I’m so glad… there’s no problem
That’s fine, actually I’m on the hiring committee, so there’ll be at least one friendly face
You know, Junior Miss is where I started
Oh, I had to sleep with the ugliest guy to get that job
I mean, no-no-no-no-no, don’t you worry, I’m sure with your qualifications you won’t need to sleep with some guy to get that job
Although, I might need some convincing
I am so excited—I may vomit
Will you calm down, he’s just a human guy
Look you don’t understand, Gandolf is amazing
Y’know you’re never know what’s gonna end up happening, you go out for a couple of beers and end up on a fishing boat to Nova Scotia
Oh yeah, it’s beautiful country up there
I got my passport, fresh socks, and a snake bite kit
It’s not gonna be exactly like last time
All right, I’ll see you guys
I have an audition, but I’ll definitely hook up with you later
Where are you gonna be around noon
Oh, well, well maybe next time then
He’s not gonna make it, he’s stuck in Chicago
You have a very impressive resume, Ms
I especially like what I see here about implementing a new filing system
You mean those-those little colored labels you put on all the folders
It certainly did brighten up the inside of the filing cabinets
Well, they uh, they-they do more than that
I notice that you’ve been trusted with a lot of rather important responsibilities
Yes, Joanna really has been an incredible mentor to me
And Rachel has been really incredible in getting my morning bagel for me
It’s amazing how she gets it right almost every time
I-I-I of course, I have more responsibilities than that
Oh yes, well there’s the coffee too
Rachel can carry two things at once
Now a uh, big part of this job is cultivating personal relationships, especially with designers
And Rachel shouldn’t have any problem with that
The only problem might be getting a little too friendly, if you know what I mean
With them, under them, what’s the difference
Oh, the Chelsea Reporter, ohh, this used to keep me so warm
All right, look at my on the back page
Sure, but I’d have to order two meals, one for me and one for the guy pointing the gun to my head
You really laid into this place
Hey, they don’t pay me a penny a word to make friends
I found a guy that who could fix up the van for catering
Do you need me to go with you
But are we sure we don’t want the waterbed
I want to talk to you about your review
Oh my God, oh my God
So you could hang up on me
Look, I-I’m never gonna let you up so you may as well just go away
Just give me a chance too…
Hey, do you need to get in
Our food is not inedible swill
I had five friends who couldn’t eat it, and one of them eats books
Well our service is not grossly incompetent
The waiter carried the breadsticks in his pants
Well, you said that we except the Discover Card, which we do not
But I stand by my review, I know food and that wasn’t it
You’re marinara sauce tasted like tomato juice
You should serve it with vodka and a piece of celery
I’m proud of that sauce, it’s delicious
You own an Italian restaurant and you think that tastes good
Hand me those tomatoes, I’m gonna show you what it should taste like
How long is this gonna take
‘Cause I got another critic to go yell at
I wanna talk about that interview
I thought it went very well
That’s what I want to talk to you about
Now, just to brief you…  I may cry, but they are not tears of sadness or of anger, but just of me having this discussion with you
Rachel, please, don’t make a scene
You now just crossed the line into completely useless
Do you want me to quit
What would make you think that
Well of those things that you said in the interview, I mean if you believe any of them, I must not be a very good assistant
I am just gonna pack up my desk,  and I will be gone by the end of the day
Well, I guess there’s no use to me sticking around ‘til the end of the day
You can put your sad little muffin back in it’s drawer
If you must know the truth, I didn’t want to lose a perfectly good assistant
That’s why I said all those things about your flirting and your drinking…
Oh, I must’ve said that after you left
That you enjoyed the occasional drink…ing binge
You are just a horrible person
If you’re gonna get all sensitive about it
I don’t want to lose you
What if I, create a position for you
I’ll make you an assistant buyer in this department
You can have your own office, and a raise
What are you guys doing here
I thought you’d be out partying with Gandel-worf
It’s Gandolf, and he’s not coming
So you’ve been sittin’ around here all mornin’
Yeah, and I-I gave first names to all of the foosball players
I can’t believe he didn’t come
So what if he didn’t come
We can still go out and party ourselves
Oh-no, y’know with Gandolf we’d be out all night
We’d meet, we’d meet total strangers, and hang out with them
We’ll do it all, and better
Look, after tonight, Gandolf will want to party with us, dude
It’s not like we don’t know how to party
And may-maybe we could end up on a boat again
Hey-hey-hey, when uh, when were we on a boat
Remember that really cold morning, you woke up and those dogs were licking your face
Hey Mon, little question for ya
How do you think this suit will look on an assistant buyer
Okay, the owner of Allesandro’s came over to yell at me, but instead I made him some sauce, and he offered me the job as head chef
You just ruined the thing I was practicing the whole way home, but I’m soo happy
I finally get to run my own kitchen
Hey, Pheebs, quick question for ya
How do you think this suit would look on an assistant buyer at Bloomingdale’s
I don’t know, it would totally depend on her coloring and…  You got the job
Ohh, it’s gonna be so great
I’m gonna get to help decide what we sell, I’m gonna have an office with walls and everything
Okay, is this the day of good news or what
Umm, Phoebe, I kinda need to talk to you about that
Umm, well I-I-I think it might be time for me to take a step back from catering
But we’ve only had one job
I know, but now we have this second one and it just, it feels like it’s snowballing, y’know
I got offered the head chef job at Allesandro’s
You don’t really need me for the business
With out you it’s just me driving up to people’s houses with empty trays and asking for money
But umm, I-I-I’ll pay you back all the money you invested, and you can keep the van
I gotta get out of here
All right, so we’ll get a little coffee, and get energized, and we’ll head back out
We don’t need that wizard guy
We hit a couple of clubs, talked to some strangers, and uh, after this, we’ll head down to the docks and see about that boat thing
Yeah, but uh, I don’t want to be up too late, so uh, I’ll have a decaf
Actually, can I get some hot water with a little lemon
I think I strained my voice screaming in there
Does it have to be so loud
I can’t hear a word you’re saying, my ears are ringing so bad
I’m just glad I brought that extra pair of socks, y’know
I used them as mittens, I didn’t want to touch a thing in that last place
We’re not sad, we’re not sad, we’re just not 21 anymore
And I want to sit in a comfortable chair, and watch television and go to bed at a reasonable hour
And I like to hang out in a quiet place where I can talk to my friends
And so what if I like to go home, throw on some Kenny G, and take a bath
Y’know, I’m-I’m glad you decided to hear me out
I’ve been doing a lot of thinking
And umm, well, I came up with a whole bunch of businesses you can do with your van
Okay umm, you could be flower delivery person
All right, I’ve got a whole bunch of uh-uh, stuff in this area, but umm, I’m getting the feeling that you don’t want to deliver
I’m guessing that if you don’t want to deliver, you probably don’t want to pick stuff up either
Y’know what, let’s do the catering business
Yeah, y'know I-I made a commitment to you
Y’know what, it’d be, it’d be fun
Okay, ooh, let’s plan the wedding reception
You really wanted me to do something with this van
Y’know what, I want you to take the chef job
Yeah, I don’t want to be the reason you’re unhappy, that would just make me unhappy, and I really don’t want to be the reason I’m unhappy
Besides, it might be kinda fun to form the new A-Team
Well, she was leaving work and she was hit by a cab
I didn’t realize that she was so close
Lynch, I know that this is an emotional and difficult time, for all of us
But by any chance did Joanna send any paperwork your way before… it happened
Imagine, if she had just stepped off that curb a few seconds later
Yes-yes, just a few seconds and she’d still be with us—nothing about an assistant buyer
Oh, Sophie, I guess you didn’t hear about Joanna…
I’m so excited about having Monica come on board with us
Although I do feel bad about having fired chef Emillio, it’s like losing a member of the family
Of course, that literally is the case for several of you
Tony, Carlos, Marie, please, tell your father how much we’re gonna miss him
Now, I know that Monica has a lot of great ideas for this place, well, you all read the review
So without much further ado, I present to you our new head chef
Umm, I just wanna say, uh  that with a pinch of exictement, a dash of hard work, a dollup of cooperation, we can have the recipe
